articles.title: 中国经济：推进电油等领域改革，允许更多领域外资独资--发改委副主任
articles.description: 路透北京3月24日 - 中国国家发展和改革委员会副主任宁吉喆周日表示，深入推进电力、油气、铁路领域改革，将竞争业务推向市场，允许更多领域实行外资独资经营，制定鼓励外商投资产业目录，扩大鼓励外商投资的范围，一批重大外资项目加快落地。

articles.title: Spring training roundup: Boston's Sale pitches five shutout innings
articles.description: Boston left-hander Chris Sale pitched five shutout innings on Saturday shortly after his rich contract extension was formally announced as the Red Sox rolled to a 12-3 victory over the visiting Pittsburgh Pirates at Fort Myers, Fla.
